name: Niftymancer
blurb: A fun, gothic, lane defense RPG where you summon ghosts and zombies to protect yourself from \u201cevil\u201d pixies and forest creatures.

rewards.reward: Haunting Help --\r\nIn appreciation for helping us get started, you get an exclusive Niftymancer WALLPAPER,\r\nfeaturing the work of the Niftymancer art team and Justin Hillgrove.
Baleful Benefactor --\r\nSpecial INFINITE ENERGY and a random useful MAGIC ITEM when Niftymancer opens its\r\ndoors! Also includes the wallpaper.

Awesome Acolyte --
Receive THREE random magic items, including one legendary (PURPLE) when you begin
playing Niftymancer. Additionally, you'll be listed in the OFFICIAL CREDITS as a benefactor
of the game. Includes all previous awards.
Friendly Phantom --\r\nImpress your friends with the Niftymancer COLORING BOOK, featuring the work of the\r\nentire art team! Includes all previous awards

Thoughtful Thaumaturgist --
In addition to the coloring book and other prior awards, you get the special BLACK CAT pet
in-game. Like all pets in game, it can be used to help you and to be lent to your friends to
help them, and will be superior to any of the cats available in the first several regions.
Curious Conjurer --\r\nReceive an official glossy Niftymancer POSTER! Includes all previous awards.
Welcome Wizard --\r\nReceive the NIFTYMANCER poster, but this one will be signed by the whole team at\r\nTrilabrys Interactive. Includes all previous awards.

Spiffy Sorcerer --
Your generous donation gets you not just the poster, but a tee shirt of the wickedly
cool “Better Living Through Spells and Hexes”, illustrated by Justin Hillgrove. (Male
Necromancer version)

Spiffy Sorceress --
Your generous donation gets you not just the poster, but a tee shirt of the wickedly
cool “Better Living Through Spells and Hexes”, illustrated by Justin Hillgrove. (Female
Necromancer version)

Splendid Spellbinder --
Your outstanding assistance will get you the tee shirt, poster, and other previous swag,
along with a limited edition BLUE FAERIE DRAGON pet. Like all pets in game, it can be
used to help you and to be lent to your friends to help them. The Blue Faerie Dragon will
only be given to people who help with the Kickstarter campaign, so it will give you extra

bragging rights!

Notorious Nazgul --\r\nIn addition to the tee-shirt and all the previous awesome goodies, our designers will work with you to build a QUEST within the Niftymancer game world!  Other players will see and play your quest, for a cool magic item in one of the many realms of the game world.  Includes all of the digital items, pets, coloring book, poster, and tee shirt.

Magnificent Magician --\r\nYou get to design a magical item that will be adapted by our team and integrated into the game.  You will be able to gift this item to your friends, and all other players will have the ability to find the item in-game, and learn the lore about it.  Includes all of the digital items, pets, coloring book, poster, and tee shirt.

Enlightened Evoker --\r\nThis one is sweet.  You get a limited edition, high quality Niftymancer print of an original work done by Justin Hillgrove, specially numbered and signed, and rendered on watercolor paper.  Ideal for framing and putting above your desk! (Autographed by the team, if you so desire).  Includes all of the digital items, pets, coloring book, poster, and tee shirt.

Malificent Magister --\r\nA monster you design will be adapted by our team and integrated into the game!  What will it be?  A wonderous dryad queen?  An imp or elemental?  Some sort of undead horror?  Editorial discretion applies.  Includes all of the digital items, pets, coloring book, poster, and tee shirt.

Luminous Lich --\r\nYou get to design a monster that our team will render (editorial discretion applies), and you will automatically get a pet version of that monster that helps you AND can be lent to friends to help them!  There are few better ways to show off... Includes all of the digital items, pets, coloring book, poster, and tee shirt.

Nifty Necromancer --\r\nYou get to be a FAIRY or NECROMANCER god or goddess (you can be a BAD FAIRY deity if you wish).  You get to work with our design team and Justin to envision a boss monster and boss fight that involves your persona.  All other players will encounter your character visage at some point in the game, and you will get a magical item related to it that can be gifted to any of your friends (but only by you).  You'll also receive an autographed print on canvas of your character from Justin.  Includes all of the digital items, pets, coloring book, poster, and tee shirt.

Amazing Archlich --\r\nThis is it.  The MEGAPRIZE; a veritable dragon hoard, which celebrates YOU as one of the major patrons of Niftymancer!  This prize combines all prior awards, including the tee shirt, custom magic item, custom monster, custom monster pet, limited edition print, and necromancer/fairy deification and grants a \u201cVery Special Thanks To\u201d in the credits and on the main canvas page.
